name: visualizacion-barrios
description: Mapa coropl√©tico de barrios de CABA para Looker Studio

scripts.deploy:js: npm run build && BUCKET_PATH=$(cat .bucket_path) && [[ "$BUCKET_PATH" == gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/* ]] && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp dist/Visualization.js "$BUCKET_PATH/Visualization.js"
scripts.deploy:css: BUCKET_PATH=$(cat .bucket_path) && [[ "$BUCKET_PATH" == gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/* ]] && if [ -f dist/Visualization.css ]; then gsutil -h "Content-Type: text/css" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp dist/Visualization.css "$BUCKET_PATH/Visualization.css"; else echo "No CSS to deploy"; fi
scripts.deploy:assets: BUCKET_PATH=$(cat .bucket_path) && [[ "$BUCKET_PATH" == gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/* ]] && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/json" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/Config.json "$BUCKET_PATH/Config.json" && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/json" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/manifest.json "$BUCKET_PATH/manifest.json" && gsutil -h "Content-Type: image/png" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/Logo.png "$BUCKET_PATH/Logo.png" && gsutil -h "Content-Type: image/png" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/Icon.png "$BUCKET_PATH/Icon.png"
scripts.deploy: npm run prepare:version && npm run deploy:js && npm run deploy:css && npm run deploy:assets
